passage_text: Meaning of Juan. Hebrew name. In Hebrew, the name Juan means-Gift from God.. Other origins for the name Juan include-Hebrew, Spanish, Spanish.The name Juan is most often used as a boy name or male name. Hebrew Name Meaning

Juan /juan/ [1 syll.] as a boys' name is pronounced wahn. It is of Spanish and Hebrew origin, and the meaning of Juan is  God is gracious . Variant of John, often used in combination with other names. Basketball player Juwan Howard; baseball player Juan Gonzales; King Juan Carlos of Spain.

Hebrew Meaning: The name Juan is a Hebrew baby name. In Hebrew the meaning of the name Juan is: Gift from God. American Meaning: The name Juan is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Juan is: Gift from God. Spanish Meaning: The name Juan is a Spanish baby name. In Spanish the meaning of the name Juan is: The Spanish form of John: God is gracious. Often used in combination with other names.
